## ğŸ¯ Project Overview
RailSmart is an intelligent, full-stack railway ticket booking and tracking simulation system developed for academic purposes under the B.Sc. I.T. Semester 5 curriculum (University of Mumbai).

The system demonstrates AI-enhanced booking, voice assistance, and real-time tracking using open-source technology.

---

## ğŸ§© Technical Stack
| Layer | Technology | Purpose |
|-------|-------------|----------|
| Frontend | **Flutter (Dart)** | Cross-platform UI for booking & tracking |
| Backend | **Node.js + Express** | RESTful API for trains, users, and tickets |
| Database | **PostgreSQL** | Persistent data storage |
| AI Module | **Python + Flask** | Voice booking & recommendation engine |
| Version Control | **Git + GitHub** | Collaboration & history management |

---

## ğŸ§  Copilot Goals
When assisting inside this workspace, GitHub Copilot should:

- Prefer **Express.js** syntax for backend routes  
- Use **PostgreSQL (pg)** for database connections and queries  
- Generate **Flutter/Dart** code for the user interface  
- Follow **RESTful design** for API endpoints  
- Avoid implementing real payment gateways (simulation only)  
- Provide clear, commented code suitable for academic presentation
